# Fate (Domain)
## Overview
| **Deities:** | *Asgardian:* |  |
|---|---|---|
| | *Eberron:* |  |
| | *Golarion:* |  |
| | *Greyhawk:* | Lyris, [[Nerull]], [[Obad-Hai]] |
| | *Kalamar:* |  |
| | *Krynn:* |  |
| | *Olympian:* |  |
| | *Other:* |  |
| | *Pharaonic:* |  |
| | *Toril:* | Beshaba, Hathor, Hoar, Jergal, Kelemvor, Savras |

**Granted Power (Ex):** You gain the uncanny dodge ability, allowing you to retain your Dexterity bonus to AC (if any) even if caught fl at-footed or struck by an invisible attacker. However, you still lose your Dexterity bonus to AC if immobilized. If you have another class that gives you uncanny dodge, your cleric levels add to that class’s level for determining when you gain the improved uncanny dodge class feature.

**Fate Domain Spells**

**1** **[[True Strike (Spell)|True Strike]]****:** +20 on your next attack roll.

**2** **[[Augury (Spell)|Augury]]** **<sup>M F</sup>:** Learns whether an action will be good or bad.

**3** **[[Bestow Curse (Spell)|Bestow Curse]]****:** –6 to an ability score; –4 on attack rolls, saves, and checks; or 50% chance of losing each action.

**4** **[[Status (Spell)|Status]]****:** Monitors condition, position of allies.

**5** **[[Mark of Justice (Spell)|Mark of Justice]]****:** Designates action that will trigger *curse* on subject.

**6** **[[Geas_Quest (Spell)|Geas/Quest]]****:** As *[[Geas, Lesser (Spell)|lesser geas]]**,* plus it affects any creature.

**7** **[[Vision (Spell)|Vision]]** **<sup>M X</sup>:** As *[[Legend Lore (Spell)|legend lore]]*, but quicker and strenuous.

**8** **[[Mind Blank (Spell)|Mind Blank]]****:** Subject is immune to mental/emotional magic and scrying.

**9** **[[Foresight (Spell)|Foresight]]****:** “Sixth sense” warns of impending danger.
